word_mean: ［拉 crab］恶性瘤，癌瘤，癌：胞性肿瘤，其自然过程呈致死性。癌瘤细胞不像良性肿瘤细胞，具有侵蚀和转移的性质，并且是高度退行发育的。恶性肿瘤分为癌和肉瘤两大类
岩，以肿块坚硬如石，表面凸凹不平，形如岩石为主要表现的体表恶性肿瘤的统称，即癌。
癌（恶性肿瘤的总称。恶性肿瘤细胞的生长处于失控状态，能侵入正常组织，并常常转移到远离其起源的部位生长）

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English, from Latin, crab or creeping ulcer', translating Greek karkinos, said to have been applied to such tumours because the swollen veins around them resembled the limbs of a crab. canker was the usual form until the 17th cent. Compare with Cancer

encyclopedia.content: 名词，即癌症、肿瘤、社会弊端的意思；其大写Cancer也有星座中的巨蟹座之意。

entry.def: Cancer is a serious disease in which cells in a person's body increase rapidly in an uncontrolled way, producing abnormal growths.

example.ex: Her mother died of breast cancer...
Jane was just 25 when she learned she had cancer...
example.tran: 简得知自己罹癌那一年才25岁。

means.word_mean: 1. any malignant growth or tumor caused by abnormal and uncontrolled cell division; it may spread to other parts of the body through the lymphatic system or the blood stream

Sentence.sentence: Our risk of cancer rises dramatically as we age.
While such vigilant（警觉的）tracking of cancer is a good thing in general, researchers are increasingly questioning whether all of this testing is necessary for the elderly

But the message that everyone must screen for cancer has become so deep-rooted that when health care experts recommended that women under 50 and over 74 stop screening for breast cancer, it caused a riotous reaction among doctors, patients and advocacy groups.
They don't like to associate technology with food," said Nicholas Genovese, a visiting scholar in cancer cell biology.
Many cancer cases could be prevented.
Better skip dinner or hit the gym afterwards, with a cancer charity warning that some iced coffees contain as many calories as a hot dinner
